name: METHOD_INFO
description: The METHOD_INFO table contains record level information for instrument interface, method, method grouper, and middle tier interface records.

columns.name: METHOD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.

columns.name: METHOD_ID_METHOD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.

columns.name: METHOD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.
